Posts.Content: Hello, I am doing my research on Hyperthermia treatment for breast cancer. Have anyone done this before? What was your experience? Does anyone know a place in UK that could do this? Thank you, Max
Posts.Title: Hyperthermia treatment for breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thank you for your response. I had a breast cancer 8 years ago and now it came back with secondaries.
Posts.Title: Hyperthermia treatment for breast cancer
